alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Wilson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 01 at 1:52PM CDT until June 03 at 11:56PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Verdigris River at Altoona affecting Wilson County. Verdigris River at Independence affecting Wilson and Montgomery Counties. Verdigris River at Coffeyville affecting Montgomery County. For the Verdigris River...including Altoona, Independence, Coffeyville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Verdigris River at Independence. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 36.0 feet, Some flooding of low lying areas and bottom land can be expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 25.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 39.5 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Friday morning. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Verdigris River Independence 30.0 25.4 Wed 1 pm CDT 39.4 28.7 16.7 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
